fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Specifies the types of repositories you want returned. Can be one of all, public, private, forks, sources, member, internal. Note: For GitHub AE, can be one of all, private, forks, sources, member, internal. Default: all. If your organization is associated with an enterprise account using GitHub Enterprise Cloud or GitHub Enterprise Server 2.20+, type can also be internal. However, the internal value is not yet supported when a GitHub App calls this API with an installation access token.

fields.name: sort
fields.description: Can be one of created, updated, pushed, full_name.Default: created

fields.name: direction
fields.description: Can be one of asc or desc. Default: when using full_name: asc, otherwise desc

fields.name: per_page
fields.description: Results per page (max 100)Default: 30

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page number of the results to fetch.Default: 1

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Required. The name of the repository.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A short description of the repository.

fields.name: homepage
fields.description: A URL with more information about the repository.

fields.name: private
fields.description: Whether the repository is private.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: Can be public or private. If your organization is associated with an enterprise account using GitHub Enterprise Cloud or GitHub Enterprise Server 2.20+, visibility can also be internal. Note: For GitHub Enterprise Server and GitHub AE, this endpoint will only list repositories available to all users on the enterprise. For more information, see "Creating an internal repository" in the GitHub Help documentation.

fields.name: has_issues
fields.description: Either true to enable issues for this repository or false to disable them.Default:

fields.name: has_projects
fields.description: Either true to enable projects for this repository or false to disable them. Note: If you're creating a repository in an organization that has disabled repository projects, the default is false, and if you pass true, the API returns an error.Default:

fields.name: has_wiki
fields.description: Either true to enable the wiki for this repository or false to disable it.Default:

fields.name: is_template
fields.description: Either true to make this repo available as a template repository or false to prevent it.

fields.name: team_id
fields.description: The id of the team that will be granted access to this repository. This is only valid when creating a repository in an organization.

fields.name: auto_init
fields.description: Pass true to create an initial commit with empty README.

fields.name: gitignore_template
fields.description: Desired language or platform .gitignore template to apply. Use the name of the template without the extension. For example, "Haskell".

fields.name: license_template
fields.description: Choose an open source license template that best suits your needs, and then use the license keyword as the license_template string. For example, "mit" or "mpl-2.0".

fields.name: allow_squash_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow squash-merging pull requests, or false to prevent squash-merging.Default:

fields.name: allow_merge_commit
fields.description: Either true to allow merging pull requests with a merge commit, or false to prevent merging pull requests with merge commits.Default:

fields.name: allow_rebase_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow rebase-merging pull requests, or false to prevent rebase-merging.Default:

fields.name: allow_auto_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow auto-merge on pull requests, or false to disallow auto-merge.

fields.name: delete_branch_on_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow automatically deleting head branches when pull requests are merged, or false to prevent automatic deletion.

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: private
fields.description:
Either true to make the repository private or false to make it public. Default: false.
Note: You will get a 422 error if the organization restricts changing repository visibility to organization owners and a non-owner tries to change the value of private. Note: You will get a 422 error if the organization restricts changing repository visibility to organization owners and a non-owner tries to change the value of private.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: Can be public or private. If your organization is associated with an enterprise account using GitHub Enterprise Cloud or GitHub Enterprise Server 2.20+, visibility can also be internal."

fields.name: security_and_analysis
fields.description: Specify which security and analysis features to enable or disable. For example, to enable GitHub Advanced Security, use this data in the body of the PATCH request: {"security_and_analysis": {"advanced_security": {"status": "enabled"}}}. If you have admin permissions for a private repository covered by an Advanced Security license, you can check which security and analysis features are currently enabled by using a GET /repos/{owner}/{repo} request.

fields.name: has_issues
fields.description: Either true to enable issues for this repository or false to disable them.Default:

fields.name: has_wiki
fields.description: Either true to enable the wiki for this repository or false to disable it.Default:

fields.name: is_template
fields.description: Either true to make this repo available as a template repository or false to prevent it.

fields.name: default_branch
fields.description: Updates the default branch for this repository.

fields.name: allow_squash_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow squash-merging pull requests, or false to prevent squash-merging.Default:

fields.name: allow_merge_commit
fields.description: Either true to allow merging pull requests with a merge commit, or false to prevent merging pull requests with merge commits.Default:

fields.name: allow_rebase_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow rebase-merging pull requests, or false to prevent rebase-merging.Default:

fields.name: allow_auto_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow auto-merge on pull requests, or false to disallow auto-merge.

fields.name: delete_branch_on_merge
fields.description: Either true to allow automatically deleting head branches when pull requests are merged, or false to prevent automatic deletion.

fields.name: archived
fields.description: true to archive this repository. Note: You cannot unarchive repositories through the API.

fields.name: allow_forking
fields.description: Either true to allow private forks, or false to prevent private forks.

fields.name: names
fields.description: Required. An array of topics to add to the repository. Pass one or more topics to replace the set of existing topics. Send an empty array ([]) to clear all topics from the repository. Note: Topic names cannot contain uppercase letters.

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: new_owner
fields.description: Required. The username or organization name the repository will be transferred to.

fields.name: team_ids
fields.description: ID of the team or teams to add to the repository. Teams can only be added to organization-owned repositories.

result.namespace_description: Create a repository using a template

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: owner
fields.description: The organization or person who will own the new repository. To create a new repository in an organization, the authenticated user must be a member of the specified organization.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Required. The name of the new repository.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A short description of the new repository.

fields.name: include_all_branches
fields.description: Set to true to include the directory structure and files from all branches in the template repository, and not just the default branch. Default: false.

fields.name: private
fields.description: Either true to create a new private repository or false to create a new public one.

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: since
fields.description: A repository ID. Only return repositories with an ID greater than this ID.

result.namespace_description: List repositories for the authenticated user

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: Can be one of all, public, or private. Note: For GitHub AE, can be one of all, internal, or private.Default: all

fields.name: affiliation
fields.description:
Comma-separated list of values. Can include:
* owner: Repositories that are owned by the authenticated user.
* collaborator: Repositories that the user has been added to as a collaborator.
* organization_member: Repositories that the user has access to through being a member of an organization. This includes every repository on every team that the user is on.Default: owner,collaborator,organization_member

fields.name: type
fields.description:
Can be one of all, owner, public, private, member. Note: For GitHub AE, can be one of all, owner, internal, private, member. Default: all  
Will cause a 422 error if used in the same request as visibility or affiliation. Will cause a 422 error if used in the same request as visibility or affiliation.Default: all

fields.name: sort
fields.description: Can be one of created, updated, pushed, full_name.Default: full_name

fields.name: direction
fields.description: Can be one of asc or desc. Default: asc when using full_name, otherwise desc

fields.name: per_page
fields.description: Results per page (max 100)Default: 30

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page number of the results to fetch.Default: 1

fields.name: since
fields.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

fields.name: before
fields.description: Only show notifications updated before the given time. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.description: Required. The name of the repository.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A short description of the repository.

fields.name: homepage

fields.name: private
fields.description: Whether the repository is private.

fields.name: has_issues
fields.description: Whether issues are enabled.Default:

fields.name: has_projects
fields.description: Whether projects are enabled.Default:

fields.name: has_wiki
fields.description: Whether the wiki is enabled.Default:

fields.name: team_id
fields.description: The id of the team that will be granted access to this repository. This is only valid when creating a repository in an organization.

fields.name: auto_init
fields.description: Whether the repository is initialized with a minimal README.

fields.name: gitignore_template
fields.description: The desired language or platform to apply to the .gitignore.

fields.name: license_template
fields.description: The license keyword of the open source license for this repository.

fields.name: allow_squash_merge
fields.description: Whether to allow squash merges for pull requests.Default:

fields.name: allow_merge_commit
fields.description: Whether to allow merge commits for pull requests.Default:

fields.name: allow_rebase_merge
fields.description: Whether to allow rebase merges for pull requests.Default:

fields.name: allow_auto_merge
fields.description: Whether to allow Auto-merge to be used on pull requests.

fields.name: delete_branch_on_merge
fields.description: Whether to delete head branches when pull requests are merged

fields.name: has_downloads
fields.description: Whether downloads are enabled.Default:

fields.name: is_template
fields.description: Whether this repository acts as a template that can be used to generate new repositories.

fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.description: Can be one of all, owner, member.Default: owner

fields.name: sort
fields.description: Can be one of created, updated, pushed, full_name.Default: full_name

fields.name: direction
fields.description: Can be one of asc or desc. Default: asc when using full_name, otherwise desc

fields.name: per_page

fields.name: page

fields.description: Required. The prefix appended by a number will generate a link any time it is found in an issue, pull request, or commit.

fields.name: url_template
fields.description: Required. The URL must contain  for the reference number.

fields.name: committer
fields.description: The person that committed the file. Default: the authenticated user.
